Class Image

  • java.lang.Object
    • Image

  • public class Image
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple class to represent images (as bitmaps).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Image(int width, int height)
      Creates a new, black, image with given dimensions.
      Precondition: 0 ≤ width, 0 ≤ height
      Image(int width, int height, Color background)
      Creates a new image with given dimensions and background color.
      Precondition: 0 ≤ width, 0 ≤ height, and color is not null

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void display()
      Displays the image on the screen.
      static Image fromFile(java.lang.String filename)
      Creates an image from a file.
      int height()
      Returns this image's height.
      Color pixel(int x, int y)
      Returns the color of a pixel in this image.
      Precondition: 0 ≤ x < width and 0 ≤ y < height
      void setPixel(int x, int y, Color value)
      Sets the desired pixel in this image to the desired color.
      Precondition: 0 ≤ x < width, 0 ≤ y < height, and color is not null
      int width()
      Returns this image's width.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Image

        public Image(int width,
             int height)
        Creates a new, black, image with given dimensions.
        Precondition: 0 ≤ width, 0 ≤ height
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the image
        height - the height of the image

      • Image

        public Image(int width,
             int height,
             Color background)
        Creates a new image with given dimensions and background color.
        Precondition: 0 ≤ width, 0 ≤ height, and color is not null
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the image
        height - the height of the image
        color - the background color

    • Method Detail

      • fromFile

        public static Image fromFile(java.lang.String filename)
        Creates an image from a file. If reading fails, it returns null.
        Parameters:
        file - the name of the file to read from

      • width

        public int width()
        Returns this image's width.
        Returns:
        this image's width

      • height

        public int height()
        Returns this image's height.
        Returns:
        this image's height

      • pixel

        public Color pixel(int x,
                   int y)
        Returns the color of a pixel in this image.
        Precondition: 0 ≤ x < width and 0 ≤ y < height
        Parameters:
        x - the horizontal coordinate
        y - the vertical coordinate
        Returns:
        the color of pixel (x,y)

      • setPixel

        public void setPixel(int x,
                     int y,
                     Color value)
        Sets the desired pixel in this image to the desired color.
        Precondition: 0 ≤ x < width, 0 ≤ y < height, and color is not null
        Parameters:
        x - the horizontal coordinate
        y - the vertical coordinate
        value - the color

      • display

        public void display()
        Displays the image on the screen.
